attributes.action: Reduce the cost of insurance Vehicle, house,life
attributes.additional_details:
Reduce the cost of insurance Vehicle, house, life.
It’s time the Government stood up and directed the insurance companies to reduce their cost for insurance in general but Vehicle insurance in particular. There is no Rhyme or reason for insurance to be this high. There than making huge amounts of profit for the insurance companies. We the general public are held to ransom every year with our renewal notice and we are forced to pay through the nose for a service that is extremely unfair. To quote insurance for new driver in a Vauxhall Corsa  £2500, for a car that cost £145. No doubt you have similar stories now’s the time to speak out WE HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF BEING TAKEN FOR A RIDE
